title: 524 â€˜Tis So Sweet to Trust in Jesus

lines: 1. Tis so sweet to trust in Jesus, Just to take Him at His word; Just to rest upon His promise, Just to know, Thus saith the Lord.
Refrain : Jesus, Jesus, how I trust Him How I've proved Him o'er and o'er! Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus! O for grace to trust Him more!
2. O how sweet to trust in Jesus, Just to trust His cleansing blood; Just in simple faith to plunge me 'Neath the healing, cleansing flood.
3. Yes, 'tis sweet to trust in Jesus, Just from sin and self to cease; Just from Jesus simply taking Life, and rest, and joy, and peace.
4. I'm so glad I learned to trust Thee, Precious Jesus, Saviour, Friend; And I know that Thou art with me, Wilt be with me till the end.
